t: Japanese lens maker Hoya halts production after cyberattack | Reuters
s: April 4, 2024 - Japanese lens maker Hoya Corp on Thursday said the production of several of its products have stopped after a system failure, which was "most likely caused by unauthorised access" to its servers.
